entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Uranium City
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:17 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -34.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Uranium City 8:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 103.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 70 %

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 42 this evening and minus 47 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 29.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 29. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 24 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 24 by morning. Wind chill minus 37 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
